name: Mom's Little Smokies
author: NATTUMS
summary: These are great for the holidays or special occasions. I am always asked to bring these for our office parties and they are the first to go.
ingredients: 1 teaspoon prepared yellow mustard (such as French's®)
2 (16 ounce) packages cocktail-size smoked link sausages (such as Hillshire Farm Lit'l Smokies ®)
directions: Stir the ketchup, brown sugar, vinegar, mustard, cinnamon, and cloves together in a saucepan over low heat; cook until completely warmed, about 5 minutes
Add the sausages and continue cooking until the sausages are heated through, stirring occasionally, about 25 minutes
